sentences.sContent: When a head dissociates, one charge remains stuck at the interface, and the other, attracted to the surface by electrostatic forces, wanders only a short distance away.
sentences.sContent_eng: When a head dissociates, one charge remains stuck at the interface, and the other, attracted to the surface by electrostatic forces, wanders only a short distance away.
sentences.sCn: 当一个头电离之后，一个电荷保留在表面上，而另一个电荷则由于静电力的吸引而在很短的一段距离外游动。

sentences.sContent: Another BI system, recently deployed with promising results, features an electrostatic pad that presses against the offender’s upper arm at all times, chemically “tasting” sweat for signs of alcohol.
sentences.sContent_eng: Another BI system, recently deployed with promising results, features an electrostatic pad that presses against the offender’s upper arm at all times, chemically “tasting” sweat for signs of alcohol.
sentences.sCn: 最近另外一种BI公司发明的系统也获得了良好的成效。 这种静电发射的装置通过按压违法者的上臂来 “品尝”他体内的酒精含量。

phrases.pCn: 静电作用；静电相互作用；静电相互酌
静电粉末喷涂；静电粉体涂膜
静电分离器；静电选矿机

trans.tranOther: of, concerned with, producing, or caused by static electricity
